code: import{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Login(_ref){let{setUser}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const res=await fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/auth/login",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});if(!res.ok){setError("Invalid email or password");return;}const user=await res.json();localStorage.setItem("token",user.token);setUser(user);navigate("/account");}catch(err){console.error(err);setError("Login failed.
